author: Gautam S Mengle
text:
The Thane police on Wednesday said that among a set of tablets found in the bedroom of mass murder accused Hasnain Warekar, one strip of pills has been found to be a prescription medicine for schizophrenia.

The police are now trying to find out how Hasnain got the pills, which are sold on prescription only, and trying to identify the doctor who prescribed them to him.

Hasnain is accused of having killed 14 members of his family at his Kasarwadawali residence in the early hours of Sunday, after which he killed himself.

According to police sources, the pills were found in the computer trolley in Hasnain’s room on the first floor during a detailed search of the house that was conducted after the bodies were cleared and forensic samples collected.
title: Schizophrenia medicine found in Hasnain’s house
